notes.title: First Take After Monday Opens
notes.excerpt: Risk-off repricing after the Middle East escalation; watching oil and shipping for persistence.

notes.title: Momentum Unwinding
notes.excerpt: Momentum unwind looks like a positioning clean-up, not a macro break.

notes.title: 2026 Global Economic Outlook (II) – China & Japan – The Quiet End of Old Models
notes.excerpt: China growth stable but demand weak; RMB managed appreciation; Japan shifts to a new policy regime with fiscal/security-driven macro.

notes.title: 2026 Global Economic Outlook (I) – US – Alpha Matters More
notes.excerpt: Liquidity plumbing improves while labor softens; prefer curve steepeners; equities constructive but more selective.

notes.title: 2025 H2 Global Economic Outlook (II) – Japan and Europe
notes.excerpt: Japan inflation sticky but BOJ likely cautious; JGB volatility and USDJPY range; Europe easing amid fiscal divergence.

notes.title: 2025 H2 Global Economic Outlook (I) - US and China
notes.excerpt: H2 outlook: US resilience vs tariff drag; Fed cautious; curve steepener; USD softer; China growth constrained by trade and deflation.
